summary: Adds knew schools of magic for your darker characters
descriptionHtml: Adds two knew schools of magic to yoir game for darker characters that will do whatever it takes to stop others for wanting a fight. Also adds a knew mode called Ancient Lord/Lady depending on the gender and knew robes,weapons armour know as Ancient items. The Spells can be very destructive, very positive or a mix of both. Contains extensive gore and violence.
author: Kunai_Kioblisos
